LanguageData.GR_SpinobearEggUnfertilized.label: spinobear egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.GR_SpinobearEggUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized spinobear egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.GR_SpinobearEggFertilized.label: spinobear egg (fert.)
LanguageData.GR_SpinobearEggFertilized.description: Fertilized spinobear egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into an spinobear.

LanguageData.GR_ParasaurolopeEggUnfertilized.descript: Unfertilized parasaurolope egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.GR_ParasaurolopeEggFertilized.label: parasaurolope egg (fert.)
LanguageData.GR_ParasaurolopeEggFertilized.descriptio: Fertilized parasaurolope egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. If all goes well, it should hatch into a parasaurolope.

LanguageData.GR_StegothrumboEggUnfertilized.label: stegothrumbo egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.GR_StegothrumboEggUnfertilized.descripti: Unfertilized stegothrumbo egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This is insanely nutritive!

LanguageData.GR_StegothrumboEggFertilized.description: Fertilized stegothrumbo egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. This is insanely nutritive! If all goes well, it should hatch into a stegothrumbo.
